name: Documenting Designs: Advanced Cards
description:
Here is a set of over 100+ advanced documentation cards built using variants to help your team collaborate and communicate more clearly in Figma.


If you're looking for a more streamlined documentation style, check out this set of simple cards.


--


I initially created these (and a few others) to share how our cross-functional teams at SEP approach collaboration. You can find my blog post here.
